children.subject: Hi, I've opened it again with waitlist.

history.content:
Hi! I’m a current Berkeley student. My lower-div friends were asking me for career advice so I connected them with some mentors in the tech industry, and I thought why not expand it to other Berkeley undergrads? If you're interested, please sign up by the extended deadline 2/11.
 
WHAT: Connect with industry professionals (mostly alumni) for career advice, interview prep, and networking. We'll match you to our mentors who work at Google, Cisco, Amazon, Meta, and more who work in a range of roles in tech (including a few directors and execs): engineering, product management, data science, business operations, design, marketing.

WHO: Any Berkeley student of any major and year interested in working in tech. Interested mentors can also sign up at www.mentoreasy.org

WHEN: At least one initial 30 minute session scheduled between you and your mentor, with follow ups discussed between mentor and mentee.

WHERE: Online video conference

SIGN UP by 2/11: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfMcYQVnCLbxkpG0IMu-TVf1yT-kokzkq0iPT5tbwlX1IdkwA/viewform

Questions or feedback? Email alanlp@berkeley.edu
history.subject: [1m signup] FREE 1:1 mentorship from professionals at top tech companies etc. 100+ mentee slots
